title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. It only takes focus if I drop down the combo list.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Click on the first Combo. Verify that it does not take focus. 3. Drop down the combo list and click on any option. Confirm that it now takes focus.
